__author__ = 'brady'

from itertools import combinations

def best_sum_scores(scores, num_players):
    return sum(sorted(scores)[len(scores) - num_players:])

def num_sum_combinations(scores, num_players, best_sum):
    count = 0
    for player_scores in combinations(scores, num_players):
        if sum(player_scores) == best_sum:
            count += 1
    return count

if __name__ == '__main__':
    num_tests = int(raw_input())
    for _ in xrange(num_tests):
        scores = [int(n) for n in raw_input().split()]
        num_players = int(raw_input())
        best_sum = best_sum_scores(scores, num_players)
        print num_sum_combinations(scores, num_players, best_sum)
